Hi Trudy, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.
@joel need your help on this ticket, thanks!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Support,

On these pages:
https://www.metrorehab.com.au/contact-us/#dayprogramreferral
https://www.metrorehab.com.au/contact-us/#inpatientreferral

Could we please move the Contact us sections which are at the tops to be at the bottom of the page?

Also could we have a button for the PDF download referral form on each page?
At the moment the PDF downloads are just hyperlinks within the copy.

Also the PDF form for Inpatient Referrals needs to be replaced with the attached latest version please.

Kind regards,


Trudy.
TRUDY MCENEARNEY​
MARKETING AND COMMUNICATIONS MANAGER
235 Morrison Road
Ryde
NSW
2112
D.
+61 2 9808 9356
E.
 Trudy.McEnearney@Royalrehab.com.au








From: Caleb Showyin <orthopm@metrorehab.com.au>
Sent: Monday, 24 August 2020 3:47 PM
To: Trudy McEnearney <Trudy.McEnearney@Royalrehab.com.au>; Denise Thomas <deniset@metrorehab.com.au>; Stephanie Woodgate <pa@metrorehab.com.au>; Lara Fernandez <neuro@metrorehab.com.au>
Cc: Janina Hipolito <Janina.Hipolito@Royalrehab.com.au>; Rehab Coordinator <coordinator@metrorehab.com.au>
Subject: RE: New referral form tab on Metro website


Hi Trudy,

Thanks for organising this - a good idea. We were hoping to add on this page an additional "Download Referral Form" button that is highly visible and not in the body of the text. As you can see, it is currently not easy to see. (We often have referrers calling us saying they can't find the link to download the form!).



Also, I have noticed that this PDF form is not the most current Inpatient Referral Form. If you could please replace it with the one attached that would be much appreciated.

Please let me know if you need any clarification.

Regards,
Caleb


Caleb Showyin

Orthopaedic & Specialty Programs Manager

275 Addison Road Petersham, NSW 2049
T 02 8585 4900 M 0403 099 866 F 02 9564 3064
orthopm@metrorehab.com.au
metrorehab.com.au

From: Trudy McEnearney <Trudy.McEnearney@Royalrehab.com.au>
Sent: Friday, 7 August 2020 12:15 PM
To: Denise Thomas <deniset@metrorehab.com.au>; Stephanie Woodgate <pa@metrorehab.com.au>; Lara Fernandez <neuro@metrorehab.com.au>; Caleb Showyin <orthopm@metrorehab.com.au>
Cc: Janina Hipolito <Janina.Hipolito@Royalrehab.com.au>
Subject: New referral form tab on Metro website


Good afternoon,

I hope you are all well and staying dry!

Letting you know that I reviewed the location of referral forms on the Metro site and have now created a new tab in the main menu, so it is a more obvious for users https://www.metrorehab.com.au/about-us/our-people/our-rehabilitation-specialists/


Kind regards,

Trudy.
TRUDY MCENEARNEY​

235 Morrison Road
